segments.text: We've had a few problems . One of the bolts has worked loose and a blade has snapped off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Make sure the power is switched off then tighten up all the bolts on the unit and replace the broken blade . Why is there oil all over the floor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think the valve is faulty . I couldn't regulate the pressure and the seal burst . I tried opening the emergency valve but it was jammed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Clean up the mess first , then fit a new seal and check the valve .
segments.speaker: S1
